description: A 2.4GHz RF transceiver module based on Nordic nRF24L01+ with integrated Power Amplifier (PA) and Low‑Noise Amplifier (LNA) for extended range up to 1,000 m. Supports 250 kbps, 1 Mbps, and 2 Mbps data rates, 1.9‑3.6 V supply, and an external SMA antenna.

specifications.communication_type: Wireless RF Transceiver (2.4 GHz ISM band)

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect module to Arduino: GND→GND, VCC→3.3V, CE→D9, CSN→D8, SCK→D13, MOSI→D11, MISO→D12. Use the RF24 library (https://github.com/nRF24/RF24).

example_code.explaination: This sketch initializes the nRF24L01+ module as a transmitter, sets the power level, channel, and data rate, and sends a simple text message every 500 ms.
